GapFillInput.Title: Irregular verbs
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets into the correct form of the Past simple. Type the answers in each gap.

Content.Question:
Holiday of a lifetime
Last year I got (get) married, and my husband and I had (have) a fantastic holiday afterwards. We went (go) on a safari in Africa. We saw (see) lots of beautiful animals, and at night we stayed at camps with our tour group. We met (meet) some really nice people, and at night we talked and sang (sing) around the camp fire. Most mornings we got (get) up really early, but later in the day we relaxed and did nothing! My husband took (take) lots of fantastic photographs, and I bought (buy) some interesting books about lions. When we came (come) home we had lots to talk about!
